main-features.title3: Establish new business models through APIs
main-features.feature1_title: Holistically manage APIs â€“ all APIs collected in one place, accessible and documented
main-features.feature1_text: As the number of APIs in the business environment grows, so does the complexity of their management. The KumuluzAPI solution enables holistic API management by providing an overview of APIs in the business environment.
main-features.feature2_title: Reduce duplication and promote API and business functionality consolidation
main-features.feature2_text: The API management solution provides easy insight into APIs and the business functionalities they offer. With a central registry, we easily track what already exists in our business environment and can be reused.
main-features.feature3_text: Changes to APIs in business environments are not simple, as API changes can affect the operation of applications using the APIs. The API management solution provides an overview of integrations and enables managed transition to new versions and controlled execution of API changes without client application outages.
main-features.feature4_text: Monitor API access activity and client application activities. Define access policies and plans and ensure appropriate QoS (Quality of Service). Track call trends and API gateway responsiveness.
main-features.feature5_text: Each API brings business value to the company and partners through its functionalities. Easily transform APIs into a digital asset that you market to external partners. Establish new value chains and new channels for revenue generation.
main-features.feature6_title: Use APIs for efficient B2B integration
main-features.feature6_text: B2B integrations are crucial for expanding business ambitions. Managing access to APIs that share our business functionalities with our partners is critical. We must be aware of each integration, monitor and control it, and ensure SLAs, which cannot be done efficiently without an API management solution.
main-features.feature7_title: Enable easy onboarding through a unified developer portal
main-features.feature7_text: The developer portal enables all developers (external and internal) self-service access to APIs, their documentation, and specifications. The developer portal relieves and simplifies work with external developers by reducing the number of interactions.
main-features.feature8_text: Access to APIs is enabled via API keys that are allocated upon subscription confirmation. The developer portal enables easy and secure sharing of API keys to client application developers.
main-features.feature9_text: Set up a sandbox and enable developers to interact with your APIs. The sandbox enables the establishment of a secure environment for familiarization and testing of your APIs for both external and internal developers.
main-features.feature10_title: Secure APIs and introduce access control
main-features.feature10_text: Central overview and central security management is crucial with a large number of APIs. The solution enables central access control through policies that manage SLAs. Access to all APIs in the business environment goes through a unified point - the API gateway, which simplifies security configuration and thereby significantly increases security due to simplicity and transparency.
